Changelog
=========

0.3.2 - 2015-08-10

* Fixed packaging issue

0.3.1 - 2015-07-28
------------------

* Renamed import `urlparse` to `urllib.parse` for Python 3 compatibility

0.3 - 2015-07-28
----------------

* Added support for Python 3.4

0.2 - 2014-01-16
----------------

* Fixed bug in Cartridge payment handler relating to order total

0.1 - 2014-01-16
----------------

* Initial release
